item.title: 汉莎航空任命泰森为下任董事长，克雷下台
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）表示，已指定约翰内斯-泰森（Johannes Teyssen）接替卡尔-路德维格-克莱（Karl-Ludwig Kley）担任下一任董事长。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG said it has designated Johannes Teyssen as its next chairman to succeed Karl-Ludwig Kley, who oversaw Europe’s largest aviation group for almost a decade, including the period of debilitating pandemic and an expansion into regional carriers.】

item.title: 思考富人的作用
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔 Solstice 部门将在分拆前融资 20 亿美元
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：The specialty-materials business of Honeywell International Inc. that the conglomerate is in the process of spinning off is set to raise $2 billion Tuesday in the junk-bond and leveraged-loan markets.】

item.title: 中美TikTok谈判取得进展，甲骨文股价攀升
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）股价上涨，原因是有消息称有关 TikTok 未来的谈判正在取得进展，从而缓解了该软件公司重要客户之一的不确定性。【原文：Oracle Corp. shares rose on news that negotiations over the future of TikTok are progressing, relieving some uncertainty around one of the software company’s key customers.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎网络攻击的影响波及供应商
item.description: 网络攻击导致捷豹路虎汽车公司（Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc）工厂停工，供应商也受到影响，一些欧洲零部件制造商被迫暂停或缩减自己的生产。【原文：The cyberattack that’s brought Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc factories to a standstill is affecting suppliers, with some European parts makers forced to pause or scale back their own production.】

item.title: 芝加哥预算领导者提出削减开支和提高收费以弥补赤字
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）的预算工作小组为他提供了数十种选择方案，其中包括休假、冻结招聘、增加费用以及与通胀挂钩的物业税上调等。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson’s budget working group has given him dozens of options — including furloughs, hiring freezes, fee increases and a property tax hike tied to inflation — to choose from as he works to close a $1.15 billion deficit for next year.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司正与芯片制造商合作开发 "星链 "蜂窝服务
item.description: SpaceX 公司正在与微芯片制造商合作，在手机中嵌入设备，以支持其新生的 Starlink 卫星对手机服务，这是该公司在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的公司斥资 170 亿美元从 EchoStar 公司收购无线频谱之后迈出的关键一步。【原文：SpaceX is working with microchip manufacturers to embed devices in phones to support its nascent Starlink satellite-to-cell service, a key step following the Elon Musk-led company’s $17 billion deal to acquire wireless spectrum from EchoStar Corp.】

item.title: 奥古斯塔国家赛新增亚马逊 Prime 频道转播 2026 年美国名人赛
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）旗下的 Prime Video 已成为首家与奥古斯塔国家高尔夫俱乐部（Augusta National Golf Club）达成协议的主要技术流媒体公司，将在 2026 年播出美国名人赛（Masters Tournament）的首轮比赛。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Prime Video has become the first major tech streamer to strike a deal with Augusta National Golf Club, airing the early rounds of the Masters Tournament in 2026.】

item.title: 荷兰承诺加入北约后将国防开支增至 270 亿欧元
item.description: 荷兰明年将把国防预算提高到 270 亿欧元（320 亿美元），努力实现北约提出的到 2035 年将国内生产总值的 5%用于安全的新目标。【原文：The Netherlands will boost its defense budget next year to €27 billion ($32 billion), as the country works toward meeting NATO’s new goal of spending 5% of gross domestic product on security by 2035.】

item.title: 穆迪称非洲经济增长回升，信用前景稳定
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）表示，撒哈拉以南非洲地区今明两年的经济增长将加速，这将支撑该地区稳定的信用前景，尽管融资成本高企、税收疲软。【原文：Economic growth in sub-Saharan Africa will accelerate this year and next, underpinning the region’s stable credit outlook despite high financing costs and weak revenue collection, said Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议前美国国债走高
item.description: 由于零售销售强于预期，未能打破美联储将开始一系列降息措施以支持疲软的劳动力市场的押注，国债走高。【原文：Treasuries moved higher as stronger-than-expected retail sales failed to derail bets that the Federal Reserve is set to begin a series of interest-rate cuts to support the sagging labor market.】

item.title: YouTube 以创作者和消费者为目标，广泛推动人工智能的发展
item.description:
该公司正大力借助谷歌 DeepMind 的最新视频生成模型和其他人工智能工具来吸引创作者，并紧跟竞争对手的步伐。【原文：

It’s leaning heavily on Google DeepMind’s latest video-generation model and other AI tools to lure creators and keep pace with rivals.

】

item.title: 米兰在政策会议上宣读美联储就职誓言
item.description: 美联储在一份声明中说，斯蒂芬-米兰周二宣誓就任美联储理事会成员，为他参加本周备受关注的美联储利率制定小组会议扫清了障碍。【原文：Stephen Miran was sworn in Tuesday as a member of the Federal Reserve’s Board of Governors, the central bank said in a statement, clearing the way for his participation in a closely watched meeting of the Fed’s rate-setting panel this week.】

item.title: 贝莱德公共投资部长期高管奥康纳将于 2026 年退休
item.description: Walter O'Connor 在市政债券领域工作了四十年，明年将从贝莱德公司退休。【原文：Walter O’Connor, who has worked in municipal bonds for four decades, is retiring from BlackRock Inc. next year.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）受美国关税影响下调瑞士经济增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的数据显示，瑞士经济增长正受到包括美国高关税在内的全球不确定性以及避险资金流入瑞士法郎的压力。【原文：Swiss growth is coming under pressure from global uncertainty including high US tariffs and safe-haven flows into the franc, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯希望与私募股权巨头建立数十亿美元的人工智能合作关系
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯新成立的人工智能公司Humain正在与全球私募股权公司就合作事宜进行早期谈判，以便将大量资金投入数据中心和相关基础设施。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence company, Humain, is in early-stage talks with global private equity firms on a partnership to plow significant capital into data centers and related infrastructure, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 芯片股在人工智能增长中迎来 2017 年以来最佳连胜势头
item.description: 周二，芯片制造商的股价再次攀升，有望创下近八年来最长的连胜纪录。【原文：Shares of chipmakers are climbing again on Tuesday, putting them on track for their longest winning streak in almost eight years.】

item.title: 安哥拉自2023年以来首次降息，通胀有所缓解
item.description: 安哥拉央行两年半来首次下调借贷成本，因为预期这个非洲产油国的通胀将继续缓解。【原文：Angola’s central bank cut borrowing costs for the first time in two and a half years on expectations that inflation will continue to ease in the oil-producing African nation.】

item.title: 迪士尼、环球影业、华纳兄弟起诉中国人工智能初创公司 MiniMax
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司、康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp）旗下的环球影城（Universal Studios）和华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Walt Disney Co., Comcast Corp.’s Universal Studios and Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. are suing Chinese artificial intelligence startup MiniMax, accusing the company of pirating the studios’ intellectual property.】

item.title: 尽管抵押贷款利率下降，但美国住宅建筑商情绪依然低迷
item.description: 本月，美国住宅建筑商的情绪仍处于多年来的最低水平之一，凸显出尽管最近抵押贷款利率有所下降，但住房市场仍处于深度冻结状态。【原文：Sentiment among US homebuilders remained at one of its lowest levels in years this month, underscoring the deep freeze in the housing market despite a recent drop in mortgage rates.】

item.title: 纳斯达克 100 指数接近罕见的 10 日连胜，股市保持稳定
item.description: 周二上午，美国股市继续上扬，在交易员为美联储重启降息周期做好准备之际，美国股市测试了连续创下的新高。【原文：US equities were clinging to an advance Tuesday morning, testing a streak of record highs as traders readied for the Federal Reserve to restart its interest-rate cutting cycle.】

item.title: 机器人初创公司 Figure AI 获得 390 亿美元新融资
item.description: 开发仿人机器人的 Figure AI 公司在一轮融资中获得了超过 10 亿美元的承诺资金，估值达 390 亿美元，这笔交易将使该公司成为最有价值的初创企业之一。【原文：Figure AI Inc., a company developing humanoid robots, has received more than $1 billion in committed capital in a financing round that values it at $39 billion, a deal that would make it one of the most valuable startups.】

item.title: 对冲基金重申降息押注，巴西消费物价指数有望降温
item.description: 巴西对冲基金的表现优于基准基金，因为当地货币接近一年来的高点，而通胀降温又增加了降息的可能性。【原文：Brazilian hedge funds are outperforming their benchmark as the local currency trades near a one-year high and cooling inflation ups the likelihood of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 瑞典和芬兰敦促欧盟重新考虑森林的气候目标
item.description: 瑞典和芬兰正敦促欧盟委员会重新考虑其气候工作方法，并对限制伐木的现行规定将严重影响这两个国家的主要林业部门表示担忧。【原文：Sweden and Finland are urging the European Commission to rethink its approach to climate work, expressing concern that current rules that limit logging will severely impact the countries’ key forestry sector.】

item.title: 美国工业生产在上月下降后略有回升
item.description: 美国 8 月份的工业生产几乎没有增长，反映出制造业活动略有增长，而公用事业有所下降。【原文：US industrial production barely rose in August, reflecting a modest gain in manufacturing activity and a decline in utilities.】

item.title: Boost Run 将通过 6.14 亿美元的 SPAC 合并在美国上市
item.description: 人工智能云基础设施公司 Boost Run LLC 已达成协议，将通过与 Willow Lane Acquisition Corp.【原文：AI cloud infrastructure company Boost Run LLC has reached an agreement to go public on the Nasdaq through a merger with Willow Lane Acquisition Corp.】

item.title: ServiceNow 在斯蒂芬-罗斯大厦项目中开设佛罗里达办事处
item.description: ServiceNow Inc. 正在向佛罗里达州西棕榈滩扩张，将在由亿万富翁斯蒂芬-罗斯（Stephen Ross）开发的一座办公大楼内开设一个可容纳数百名员工的办公地点，斯蒂芬-罗斯是纽约著名的开发商，去年脱离了相关公司（Related Cos.），以 "相关罗斯"（Related Ross）的名义专注于佛罗里达州的项目。【原文：ServiceNow Inc. is expanding to West Palm Beach, Florida, opening a location for several hundred employees in a planned office tower being developed by billionaire Stephen Ross, the famed New York developer who broke from Related Cos. last year to focus on his Florida projects under the name Related Ross.】

item.title: 夏季干燥后欧洲葵花籽油价格飙升
item.description: 乌克兰和欧洲的葵花籽油价格飙升，因为预测机构预计，在炎热干燥的夏季阻碍作物生长之后，乌克兰的葵花籽油产量较低，整个欧洲大陆的产量也有限。【原文：Ukrainian and European sunflower oil prices have jumped as forecasters expect low yields in the country and limited production across the continent, following a hot, dry summer that hampered crop development.】

item.title: 安比帕重整治理，以期重获市场信心
item.description: Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA 公司在经历了市场动荡的一年后，正在全面整顿公司治理，扩大董事会，改革委员会，并加强与投资者的对话；这是该公司与陷入困境的巴西 Banco Master 银行拉开距离、恢复信心的努力的一部分。【原文：Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA is overhauling its corporate governance after a bruising year in markets, moving to expand its board, revamp committees and step up dialogue with investors — part of an effort to distance itself from Brazil’s troubled Banco Master and restore confidence.】

item.title: 美国正在商谈为关键矿产交易设立 50 亿美元基金
item.description: 美国正在商谈设立一个 50 亿美元的基金来投资矿业，这将是美国政府为增加关键矿产供应而进行的最重要的交易。【原文：The US is in talks to set up a $5 billion fund to invest in mining, in what would be the government’s most significant foray into dealmaking to boost supplies of critical minerals.】
